summary: Five unmarried sisters make the most of their simple existence in rural Ireland in the 1930s.
cast: Gerard McSorley|Meryl Streep|Michael Gambon|Catherine McCormack|Kathy Burke|Sophie Thompson|Brid Brennan|Rhys Ifans|Darrell Johnston|Lorcan Cranitch|John Kavanagh|Marie Mullen|Dawn Bradfield|Peter Gowen|Kate O'Toole|Patrick McGahern
title: El baile de agosto
